ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from creating a record with the PAC Warranty Record Type when the parent Reference PAC record has a blank Main Cause value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), $RecordType.Name = "PAC Warranty Record Type",Reference_PAC__r.RecordType.Id <> "012700000001kI0", (ISPICKVAL(Reference_PAC__r.Main_Cause__c,'')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot create a Warranty record when the related Reference PAC record has a blank Main Cause field.
